title: 3 Reasons Why People Leave The Church | Unapologetic 90
itunes:title: 3 Reasons Why People Leave The Church | Unapologetic 90
description: Three out of every five young Christians (59%) disconnect either permanently or for an extended period of time from church life after age 15. We look at some reasons why on this episode of the Unapologetic show.
